structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Charges for use of park facilities.
law.text: The city may, by ordinance, prescribe admission, fees, rentals, concessions and other charges for the use of any such area or its facilities, or may delegate such power to the commission.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741p-8.
